Parameters: AdvertiseSettings: The actual settings used for advertising, which may be different from what has been requested.
onStartSuccess(android.bluetooth.le.Adve.Description: Callback triggered in response to @B_android#bluetooth#le#BluetoothLeAdvertiser#startAdvertising_E@ indicating that the advertising has been started successfully.

Parameters: int: Error code (see ADVERTISE_FAILED_* constants) for advertising start failures.
onStartFailure(int).Description: Callback when advertising could not be started.

ClassDesc: Bluetooth LE advertising callbacks, used to deliver advertising operation status.
